Rule.Name: SoftgoalAsContributionDestination
Rule.Description: The destination of a Contribution must be a Softgoal

Rule.Name: DecompositionLinkForbidenDestinations
Rule.Description: Decomposition links must not have softgoals, resources or beliefs as a destination.
Rule.Constraint: let dt:IntentionalElementType = src.oclAsType(IntentionalElement).type in (dt=IntentionalElementType::Goal or dt=IntentionalElementType::Task)

Rule.Name: DecompositionLinkForbidenSources
Rule.Description: Decomposition links must not have beliefs as a source. Note: Beliefs are not yet IEs in jUCMNav.

Rule.Name: ISAbetweenSimilarActors
Rule.Description: ISA (generalization) must be between two actors of the same type

Rule.Name: CoversFromPositionToRole
Rule.Description: A Covers association must be from a Position to a Role
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('Covers') -> forAll (a | a.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Actor) and self.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'Position' and a.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'Role' )

Rule.Name: PlaysFromAgentToRole
Rule.Description: A Plays association must be from an Agent to a Role.
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('Plays') -> forAll (a | a.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Actor) and self.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'Agent' and a.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'Role' )

Rule.Name: OccupiesFromagentToPosition
Rule.Description: An Occupies association must be from an Agent to a Position
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('Occupies') -> forAll (a | a.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Actor) and self.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'Agent' and a.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'Position' )

Rule.Name: INSbetweenAgents
Rule.Description: An INS association must only be used between Agents
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('Occupies') -> forAll (a | a.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Actor) and self.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'Agent' and a.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'Agent' )

Rule.Name: NoDependencyInsideActor
Rule.Description: Dependency links must never completely be inside of an actor boundary
Rule.Constraint: if srcIsActor() then ( if destIsActor() then source.oclAsType(grl::CollapsedActorRef).actor <> target.oclAsType(grl::CollapsedActorRef).actor else source.oclAsType(grl::CollapsedActorRef).actor <> target.contRef.oclAsType(grl::ActorRef).contDef.oclAsType(grl::Actor) endif ) else ( if destIsActor() then source.contRef.oclAsType(grl::ActorRef).contDef.oclAsType(grl::Actor) <> target.oclAsType(grl::CollapsedActorRef).actor else source.contRef.oclAsType(grl::ActorRef).contDef.oclAsType(grl::Actor) <> target.contRef.oclAsType(grl::ActorRef).contDef.oclAsType(grl::Actor) endif ) endif

Rule.Name: DependencyInSDwithoutDependum
Rule.Description: Dependency links in an SD model must always have a dependum
Rule.Constraint: self.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'SD' implies self.urndefinition.urnspec.getAllDependencies().refs -> select (d|d.diagram=self) -> forAll (d|not(d.srcIsActor() and d.destIsActor()) )

Rule.Name: SDmodelsRestrictedLinks
Rule.Description: SD models must not have links other than dependency and actor association links

Rule.Name: NoBeliefAsLinkDestination
Rule.Description: Beliefs should not be the destination of element links
Rule.Constraint: true -- jUCMNav does not implement Beliefs as intentional elements.

Rule.Name: TasksAsDestOfAndLinks
Rule.Description: AND decomposition links should only have tasks as destinations

Rule.Name: MeansEndMustHaveGoalDest
Rule.Description: OR/IOR decomposition (means-end) links should only have goals as destinations

Rule.Name: IsPartOfBetweenSimilarActors
Rule.Description: Is Part Of association should be between two actors of the same type
Rule.Constraint: self.getLinksToForType('Is Part Of') -> forAll (a | a.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Actor) and (a.getMetadata('ST_iStar') = self.getMetadata('ST_iStar') ) )

Rule.Name: AllGRLdiagramsSRorSD
Rule.Description: All GRL diagrams should be tagged as SD or SR diagrams.

Rule.Name: SRdependencyAlwaysHasDependums
Rule.Description: Dependency links in an SR model should always have a dependum
Rule.Constraint:
self.refs -> select(r|r.diagram.oclAsType(urncore::URNmodelElement).getMetadata('ST_iStar') = 'SR') -> forAll(dr | ( dr.link.src.dependers()->size() = 0 implies dr.link.dest.dependees()->size() > 0 ) )
-- need to implement GetDependum

Rule.Name: OnlyDependenciesCrossing
Rule.Description: The only links that cross actor boundaries should be dependency links
Rule.Constraint:
not(link.oclIsTypeOf(grl::Dependency)) implies
if srcIsActor() then ( if destIsActor() then source = target else source = target.contRef endif ) else ( if destIsActor() then source.contRef = target else source.contRef = target.contRef endif ) endif
